**Professional Summary/Objective:**
Junior in the Informatics Engineering department at Politeknik Negeri Jakarta with a strong passion for software development. Expertise spans web and Android applications, with a foundational understanding of desktop application development through VB.NET, and a keen interest in artificial intelligence. Recently, earned Distinction in Bangkit 2024, specializing in Mobile Development, where honed skills in Android development, cloud-based ML integration, geolocation, and Firebase. Committed to integrating the latest technologies, ensuring projects are scalable, high-performing, and code-efficient while driving innovation through AI-powered solutions.
results.candidate_summary: Rayhan Safar Putra has over 6 months of experience as a Junior Software Developer intern at PT. Indotechsa, focusing on developing and implementing comprehensive HRD applications and automating email systems. He also gained practical knowledge in mobile development, particularly in Android, cloud-based machine learning integration, geolocation, and Firebase. His dedication to excellence led him to earn Distinction in Mobile Development during his time at Bangkit Academy in 2024.
